title: Eth2OutgoingRequestHandler | Encountered error while processing response: IllegalStateException
body:
ERROR level incident in my logs. I am including the immediately prior WARN notification in case it is relevant.

```
2020-07-29 00:14:07.292+00:00 | p2p-async-3 | WARN  | PeerSync | Failed to import block from peer (err: UNKNOWN_PARENT) SignedBeaconBlock{message=BeaconBlock{root=0x4afd44a5ffa3c8bc93943b14a4d3bce78546857fe4a62a9d92fd5d42764aa1c1, slot=212250, proposer_index=5140, parent_root=0x0880fc6d2c11cad9ebb169a980eaebe2848623423baa2155d461fcc0fbedebd1, state_root=0x453a2a32686985feba79f26e1308db58987783440b5814d302d455c5bed5082a, body=0x8ef7f5322e1bb23be50f8cf4654eb5af8d371abd70127781a54c8e07bcf77fcf}, signature=0xac96077fcaf0a07fd30d3a0a65d58fc1e7620a14aa6e721516873691b38759d3cf63b5efae3f50f3e3e184914e9f3dea00b35774802eed3e4632cbf055c64224bcab97de48a1a103dae912fbc728aa5ae49018c22cbe2f6b719e41e892dde083}: Eth2Peer{id=16Uiu2HAmTX6vDcoATZ5X5ikAxgfTsU7U5Xan8DcC1FaNG6YqUdTr, remoteStatus=Optional[PeerStatus{forkDigest=0xfdca39b0, finalizedRoot=0x70904936fb326cd88d29dc9eeb85fe4a1cc78d3e6c29c2649ab07bb526097a2b, finalizedEpoch=6633, headRoot=0x8c1eac31591edbb8369891b4b907a421b2d815c138bb8f75c1aa5bd3342fa5db, headSlot=212320}]}

```

Teku version: teku/v0.12.2-dev-fb9e13c7/linux-x86_64/-privatebuild-openjdk64bitservervm-java-13

Looks like the source of the problem is here: https://github.com/PegaSysEng/teku/blob/01ebad0c3d1a74dc939aeb6dbdeea1cb196589aa/networking/eth2/src/main/java/tech/pegasys/teku/networking/eth2/rpc/core/Eth2OutgoingRequestHandler.java#L96

This throws a noisy error in the following scenario:
* We decode multiple responses at once [here](https://github.com/PegaSysEng/teku/blob/01ebad0c3d1a74dc939aeb6dbdeea1cb196589aa/networking/eth2/src/main/java/tech/pegasys/teku/networking/eth2/rpc/core/Eth2OutgoingRequestHandler.java#L96)
* One of the earlier responses is invalid, causing us to [cancel processing](https://github.com/PegaSysEng/teku/blob/01ebad0c3d1a74dc939aeb6dbdeea1cb196589aa/networking/eth2/src/main/java/tech/pegasys/teku/networking/eth2/rpc/core/Eth2OutgoingRequestHandler.java#L130-L132)
* But we are still iterating through and delivering responses leading to this illegal state

these messages are still appearing on Medalla, about 18 times in the last 24 hours.

It almost looks like a sync issue around finalizing and switching forks some how but I really don't know enough around that area to dig much further...

I saw one on Merediths box, but also several on the aws nodes that are running master.

I haven't seen any with the exception thrown afterwards, just with the initial `Failed to import block from peer (err: UNKNOWN_PARENT)` message.

I'll check this. 
@rolfyone can you please share your exception cause there could be small but significant differences with the original one in this issue

the exception I haven't found a recurrence of, only the initial message. I think there's another ticket with just the 'unknown parent' message, maybe it'd be less confusing to close this ticket, and I'd move my notes above to that?

@rolfyone right, I didn't find any way how to reproduce the `IllegalStateException` with the current code so I'm closing this. 
Please move the desired comments to the 'unknown parent' issue you mentioned
